name: Pathfinder Rebuild
description:
This is a rebuild from the Pathfinder game that i have made some years ago.

Playable here
https://irgamer.itch.io/pathfinder

Fun fact, I wanted to polish a little and publish on google play store but it seems i did not perform a backup for that build.

So instead of overwriting that game, i have decided to just rebuild a little. plus some knowledge gained along the way a little improved. although some of the puzzle i decided to revisit on a later day.

 A quick summary is that pathfinder is a concept maze that I have had in my mind since 2016 and have been developed on and off, Just needed to get off my mind and the results are quite interesting.
